CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image and article published in New Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, February 4, 1967, pg. 1, reads: "New Days - It was a big moment in life of the Weston family Monday when Lloyd Weston, seated left, signed a letter of intent to attent Pitt University on a football scholarship. Seated beside Weston is Pitt football coach Dave Hart. Others in picture are....Mr. Weston... - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Lloyd Weston signing letter of intent to attend University of Pittsburgh on football scholarship, with University of Pittsburgh football coach Dave Hart, and Mr. Weston, posed at table in Pitt student union
